topic.title: Response On Scene Odometer Reading - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.172"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10635)/@code="67485-3" EMS Response odometer on-scene reading (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10636)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10637)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.20 UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10635)/@code="67485-3" EMS Response odometer on-scene reading (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10636)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10637)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.20 UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.172"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1917518569"/> <code code="67485-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS Response odometer on-scene reading"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation>
